page.title: 01Introduction to Carlton
page.content: Most of the village of Carlton lies in the grid_square 04640423.It is a small village but it has a large community.There are two schools,a Primary School which lies roughly in the middle of the village,and a Catholic High School which llies on the outskirts and serves the Selby District. Carlton Towers is a particularly beautiful mansion.It lies South-East of Carlton,and is resided in by the Duke of Norfolk.Each year Carlton Feast is celebrated in the grounds of Carlton Towers and a queen is chosen from the village. The surrounding area consists mainly of farmland.Carlton is predominantly an agricultural area,but a high percentage of the populus are employed in the two nearby power stations,Drax and Eggborough.
